mapper.insert: insert into business_address (address_name, phone_number, contact_name, is_default) values (#{addressName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDefault,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update business_address set address_name = #{addressName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_name = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_default = #{isDefault,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, address_name, phone_number, contact_name, is_default, create_time, update_time from business_address
